xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dba:log-download
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function dba:log-download ( $name as xs:string ) as item()+ { web:response-header( map { 'media-type': 'text/plain' }, map { 'Content-Disposition': 'attachment; filename=' || $name || '.log' } ), file:read-binary(db:option('dbpath') || '/.logs/' || $name || '.log') }
